replies.msg:
Quality Engineer (Connector OEM/ 五天工作/ 東莞office/ Up to 25K)

Hong Kong Office is located at Tuen Mun.

knowledge of TS16949, ISO9001, ISO 14001, ISO 13485, OHSAS18001 will be a plus

Requirements:

Diploma / Associate Degree / High Diploma / Degree in Manufacturing / Mechanical Engineeering / Science subjects or other disciplines
Willing to work and stay in Dongguan, 5 days work, apartment provided
1-2 years of relevant experience in handling coordinating with clients is preferred
Cable assemblies/ Wire Harness/ connector/ HDMI/ USB cables/ Injection Moulding experience is highly preferred
Hands-on experience in managing engineering projects in China is preferred
Eager to work in an expanding OEM Manufacturing company
Immediately Available is highly preferable
Remuneration package is commensurate with competency & experience. Interested parties please send full resume (WORD format) with expected salary and availability to HR Department.
